title: Google Drive now allows you to select an expiry date for files before sharing them
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:
read the original version on: www.retailnews.asia

In a recent blog post, Google announced that it is currently rolling out two new access control features to Google Drive for select Workspace users. If you are using Google Drive to share files with your colleagues, you probably know that you can set an expiration date for their access. However, you can do that only after you’ve […]

The post Google Drive now allows you to select an expiry date for files before sharing them appeared first on Retail News Asia.
